title: Hi, I’m Caleb.
text: I am an analytics-driven problem solver building a second career after a 10-year tenure as a manufacturing process engineer. I am passionate about building consensus with data, inside and outside of the workplace.

title: Personal
text: One of my best friends - my big mutt, Eddie. Can you guess his breed mix? Check out Eddie’s Embark DNA test.

title: Portfolio
text: I generated all the data visualizations (bar & column charts, donut charts, heat maps) for this report using Power BI. I also read and manually categorized about 2,000 customer comments for sentiment analysis.
